p: Leaf tannins from common guava have been added to the semen extender for the preservation of Etawa goat sperm [ 77] for 15 days at 4–5 °C. The range of concentrations employed was from 3% to 24%. The supplementation of the semen extender with guava extract improved sperm motility, viability, and plasma membrane integrity and reduced the percentage of sperm abnormalities. The most suitable extract concentration was 3%. By contrast, an extract concentration from 6% to 24% was deleterious for some sperm parameters.
